Question: Shenzhen Techvision Intelligent Technology Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Techvision Intelligent Technology Co.,Ltd

TVD3501R Codec Terminal

- Rockchip RK3588 Quad-core A76+ Quad-core A55
- 8K@60fps H.265/VP9 video decode
- 8K@30fps H.265/H.264 video encode
- 2x GbE, 2.4/5 GHz, WIFI 6, BT5.0, LTE optional
- OS: Android 12/ Linux/ UOS
